#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
int main()
{
	ll  t,k,c=0,n,i,b1;
	vector<ll>v;
	cin>>t;
	ll b[100005];
	while(t--)
	{
		for(i=0;i<100005;i++)
		{
			b[i]=0;
		}
		c=0;
		cin>>n;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>b1;
			v.push_back(b1);
		}
		k=v[0];
		ll k1=0;
		
		for(i=1;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(k==v[i] )
			{
				c++;
				if(i==(n-1))
				{
					b[k1]=c;
					k1++;
				}
				
				
			}
			if(v[i] != k)
			{
				b[k1]=c;
				k1++;
				//cout<<b[k1-1];
				k=v[i];
				c=0;
			}
			
			
		}
		//cout<<'\n';
		cout<<*max_element(b,b+k1)<<'\n';
		v.clear();
	}
	
	return 0;
}
